long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces every USD-like string to RAI according to predefined rules and user-defined rules. Moreover, this extension is capable of capturing the numbers around USD-like strings, replacing them to new numbers that more suitable for the RAI context. E.g. 1 USD would be replaced to 0.3 RAI when 1 RAI = 3 USD.
